description: Fancy an easy dinner recipe that's ready in 10 minutes? Make this fuss-free succulent lamb souvlaki with fresh Greek salad and creamy tzatziki.
name: Easy Lamb Souvlaki Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500 g Woolworths COOK souvlaki lamb strips
450 g microwave white long grain rice

recipeInstructions.text: Divide rice among serving bowls. Top with lamb and salad. Serve dolloped with tzatziki.
Divide rice among serving bowls. Top with lamb and salad. Serve dolloped with tzatziki.
